column2: "Emergency Alert: We have detected strong DOLLS energy readings in the Aelio Region. All ARKS Members, please prepare to sortie."
"As you just heard, we've detected a strong DOLLS energy signal. Their targets appear to be the ARKS Mining Rigs."
"As the name suggests, they are a type of heavy machinery that we use to excavate resources from underground."
"These excavated resources are necessary for City maintenance as well as the manufacturing of issued ARKS equipment."
"Without these resources, we will not be able to continue fighting the DOLLS."
"Radar equipment is being operated to anticipate DOLLS movement, but it's not uncommon for the radars themselves to draw their attention in the same way."
"The rigs are being escorted by way of resource convoy, but this is a large-scale offensive, so we anticipate a grueling battle."
"I'd like you to participate in this defensive battle. Please lend whatever aid you can. Thank you, and best of luck."
